response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth more than just monetary terms. However, considering my costs and the market value, I propose an offer of $10,000 for the product. This price reflects a fair balance between the investment required and the potential return on your end. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 10000}
